summary: Companion version made from my Fenry save game
descriptionHtml:
Fenry - Companion Edition by Daltemir 
Uploaded by daltemir1

Link to SaveFile of this character:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19567/

Known Issues:
Her face skin color can be darker than her body color if thats the case use the console (tilde button), click on her
and write \"setnpcWeight 1\" (without quotes) and she will look as supposed to.
I do not have the time to look further into the matter at the moment people say it  is a glitch
in the construction set but I dont know....


Description:
This mod adds my character Fenry as a companion, You can find her at the bannered Mare in Whiterun.
She doesn\'t cost anything to hire and has mediocre stats (assassin based class) specialize in light armor, 
one handed, marksman and sneak.
She got Hide armor n boots as default and uses a steel sword, to change the gear just equip something with better
stats.
Fenry uses a custom race identical to Nord to to make the mod as compatible as possible.
Her scale is 0.92 as default if you want her to be same height as a normal nord use the setscale command.


Requirements:
Pretty Face (Pack) by tktk (this mod will apply to all NPCs as well but it certainly makes everyone look better 
without this she will probably not look to good)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887

Covereyes - eyes1 by mrLenski (not Required but its what I use in the pictures)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869

More Freckles - Cute Freckles by Zhoken (nice addition that should be used)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/515

Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion by Radioragae (without this she will be bald)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110


Known Issues:
Her face skin color can be darker than her body color if thats the case use the console (tilde button), click on her
and write setnpcWeight 1 and she will look as supposed to.


Good to know:

Console Commands:

setscale \"any number\" 1 is default = sets selected targets overall body scale.

Extra commands for the I wanna take screenshots persons:

tfc = toggle free camera (lets you float around the world as spectator)

tfc 1 = same as tfc but pauses the game (good for when u wanna capture that exact moment)

tm = toggle menu, hides the User Interface Note that the console will become invisible as well.


Installation:
Either use Nexus Mod Manager or just copy the esm and paste it in the data folder.


Additional Information:
The character is made from my personal preference and everyone might not like it.

Weither you like it or not make sure to look through the mods you liked from the
pictures and endorse them if you enjoyed them.

If I have forgotten any mod you see in the pictures let me know in the comments 
section.

Pretty sure I will update this in the future but I will be gone for the summer in the meantime
id appreciate any tips or descriptions of bugs/errors in the comment section.

NOTE that I do NOT own any rights of the linked and/or required mods, if you want to edit them or
Use them to make new mods ask the authors about it.


Future Addons:
Dont have anything on my mind right now


Copyright stuff:
You may use this for your mods if you leave credit to the author (daltemir1) however
you may not make small changes and release the mod as your own.

Thanks to:
2CoolCarlos for giving me the idea and quick tips.

All the authors of the mods ive been using for their great work.


Recomended mods(mods from the screenshots):

Lighting:

Zoners high performance ENB by Shrutesh (HIGHLY recomended)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15551

DYNAVISION by Gopher and MyGoodEye
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12525

Realistic Lighting by 747823 and pluto (cant seem to find the original version so I paste link to what I think is the german one)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9263

CLARALUX by MrGoodEye
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17605

Face light by tktk1 (optional but recomended since the lighting in skyrim is pretty evil sometimes lol)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13457


Armors and Clothing:

Black Tower and Black Sacrament Armor pack by AmethystDeceiver
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5696

Ashara Princess of the Woods for UNP by SydneyB
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18008

UNP Casual Outfit - Oni Edition by Onigirl
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18240

Ninja GaGa for CBBEv3 by JackGa (kasumi armor)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19309

Imperial Investigator Armor UNP & UNPB by Calyps
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19377


Weapons:

Insanitys Celtic Katana by Insanity Sorrow (hard to see but is actually equipped in the kasumi armor pic)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15389

The bow of lorveth/ Scoiatael Weapons by Wicked_Jester
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18439


!ADULT!:

DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

GlossTech(glossy skin) by Mono5944
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5437


Player Homes and Places

Amethyst Hollows Dreamworld by AmethystDeceiver (HIGHLY recomended)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18575

The Asteria by mattcm919 (HIGHLY recomended)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13641

Perfect Whiterun by ReVan1199 (if you think whiterun could use some trees lolz)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12974


Animations:

Pretty_Weapon_idles by dualstun (using couple of thoose)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15703

Pretty Female idles by Dualstun
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11954

Sit animation by person123456789 (I like that name lol)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15674


Other:

Playable Instruments - Play and Bash by planexuser uploaded by wgstein
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9375

Closer Quivers and Longer Arrows by EvilDeadAsh34
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5711


Be sure to take a look at the mods you find interesting, and please endorse this and/or other mods
you enjoyed.

Thank You
/Daltemir
author: daltemir1
